select cart_idx , p.pd_idx , c.mb_id , p.pd_name , c.amount , c.price, (c.price * amount) money , pd_img , p.pd_stock, c.pd_category
from member m , cart c , product p where m.mb_id=c.mb_id and c.pd_idx=p.pd_idx and c.mb_id=#{mb_id} order by cart_idx
SELECT ifnull(sum(c.price*amount) , 0) FROM cart c , product p WHERE c.pd_idx =p.pd_idx and mb_id=#{mb_id}
